TopicTitle: [WIP] Nova's Plernets, a Kopernicus mod dev thread- Stockalike GP2 and GP3!

Articles.Content:
Okay, I figured out how PQS works, don't need textures anymore ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

Hopefully that means I can make these planets myself. More soon! I'll get Fluff ready!

> 
> Okay, I figured out how PQS works, don't need textures anymore ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)
> Hopefully that means I can make these planets myself. More soon! I'll get Fluff ready!

Good luck! I am still struggling with the PQS ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Oh, but you're better than I am. I was trying PQS because I couldn't make colormaps. I haven't made much progress so far ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Maybe collaborate? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Oh, but you're better than I am. I was trying PQS because I couldn't make colormaps. I haven't made much progress so far ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
> Maybe collaborate? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Sorry been busy

What do you have in mind as part of a collab? Ideas?

(\*\*I just upgraded my thread with some reworked stuff)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-18T15:20:22Z" title="10/18/2015 03:20  PM" data-short="8 yr">October 18, 2015</time> by StarCrusher96**

> 
> Sorry been busy
> What do you have in mind as part of a collab? Ideas?
> 
> (\*\*I just upgraded my thread with some reworked stuff)

![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif) I really thought this thread was dead.

I need height and color maps for the planets. I can't make any, but obviously you can...

I am also learning how to make parts, obviously not for this mod, but if I want to work on 2 mods at once, than I'm going to need some help. I'll try to do the configs, and you can do the textures...

BTW the part mod I am making is called K.O.L.O.S.S.A.L. Yes it is an acronym. It's not too much though, I think I can handle both.
I am 'good' in making planets ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) but parts is not my thing.

> 
> I am 'good' in making planets ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) but parts is not my thing.

Don't worry, I don't need any help on the parts. I only need help with the planets.

- - - Updated - - -

Yeah, I phrased that badly. I only need help on the planet height, color, and normal maps. *Maybe* some configs too, but I think I can do the configs by myself.

The part mod has nothing to do with this. I'm doing that one by myself.

> 
> > 
> > Do you want to help make planets for my mod or not? I'm not asking you for help on parts, just the planets. Do you want to help or not?
> 
> 
> yeah sure no prob

Yes! I guess that this mod's development can continue now.
Hi there. Haven't hit you up in a while. Might start collaborating with you again. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
